argument.name: options
argument.desc: All animation settings. The only required property is effect.

property.name: effect
property.desc: A string indicating which effect to use for the transition.

property.name: easing
property.desc: A string indicating which easing function to use for the transition.

property.name: duration
property.desc: A string or number determining how long the animation will run.

type.name: String
type.desc: The strings "fast" and "slow" can be supplied to indicate durations of 200 and 600 milliseconds, respectively.

property.name: complete
property.desc: A function to call once the animation is complete.
